My work produces huge amounts of waste, and it would be handy to recycle it. Right now I'm planning to grind up the items. I want to leave my options open though, so I created a case with conveyor belts.

It can supply any tool with energy and activate it. During this process, the machine can deconstruct a suitable unit into up to 9 parts, the speed of which depends on the power of the embedded computer system.
